entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
